body:
thank you everyone for your kind help!

hit a few bumps but finally have gostrip working for me:

- take me a few minutes to realize i need to update "/" to be "\\" in windows
- somehow "gostrip" not able to remove".git" folder, need to remove it from code and manually delete it

new to Go, but i will try to send a PR to "gosstrip" to add platform awareness, so that the next guy to run it will be easier!
